remarks:
Define equivalence relation for signed reals.  This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction.  From Proposition 9-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 126.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
